title: Is there still a way to block people

replies.body: You should be able to right click their name and block them if they are on your friends list.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Codebear,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=F2xNh3NV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-13T17:14:22.769+0000)
>
> You should be able to right click their name and block them if they are on your friends list.

There definitely should be an option to block players by typing their username... I encountered a very toxic player however, the last thing I would want to do is send the individual a friend request and then wait for him to accept it and then be able to block him afterwards...
